about_the_game:
A groundbreaking hybrid of deckbuilding and real-time action where you lead a squad of autonomous clone warriors and strategically play cards in real-time on the battlefield.

⏱️Play Cards in Real Time: Add the layers of timing and precise targeting to the deckbuilding genre.

🎭 Class-Based Gameplay: There are four unique playable classes, each shaping the cards you can select on each run.

🧬Defend The Harvester: Unlock and choose from 3 fundamentally different harvesters.

🌍Roguelike Rampage: Complete runs across 3 randomized planets and 11 unique biomes.

🃏Find and Collect: Collect 3 copies of a card to forge a more potent version. 3 Tiers for each card.

🌟High Replayability: The Ascension System raises the stakes with each successful run.

🔊Motivating Soundtracks & Effects: Increased immersion with a dynamic soundscape.






This intense and chaotic survival experience challenges players to master the game's intricacies and systems.

⏸️ Gameplay Slow and Pause: Control the pace by slowing the action or pausing to inspect cards.

🚀Simulated Projectiles: Standardized projectiles and explosions scale in size and pushback based on damage.

🎯Randomised Ballistics: Adding a layer of realism and randomness to your battles.

🛡️Armor & Shield Dynamics: Explore armour, shield mechanics, and penetration abilities.

🎯Automatic Strategic Targeting: Autonomous characters target enemies based on proximity, type, and direction.

📈Ascension Difficulty Levels: Incremental difficulty increases, offering high levels of mastery and replayability.

🔓Content Unlocks: Provides an evolving and engaging gameplay experience.

🔄Random Levels: 11 unique biomes of randomized level layouts.

📊Character Progression: Manage character level-ups based on individual performance in combat.

🃏Card Upgrades: Ability to find and collect 3 of the same card and forge a more powerful version.

🔄Loot Choices: Reroll randomized loot selections to maximize card upgrade opportunities.

🤖Squad Management: Build, maintain, and strategically maneuver your squad in fast-paced battles.

⚡Resource Management: Juggle energy and shield resources to play cards and keep your squad alive.

🌐Planet Node Variability: Navigate ever-changing planet layouts with randomized node arrangements.

🌿Biome-Specific Enemies: Encounter a stable of diverse enemies, randomly selected based on the biome.

🌀Formation Spawning: Hordes relentlessly come in randomized formations to test you.

📦Crates and Shard Drops: Randomized loot can be challenging to collect in time.






Azmonite is a powerful mineral that is a source of limitless energy collected by a range of unlockable harvesters. However, the abundance of Azmonite in this far-flung solar system has ignited a conflict between the invading human and native Arkinid factions.

As a Commander, your role is pivotal, and your strategic decisions will determine your squad's survival. You must navigate the chaos of real-time combat while harnessing the energy from nearby Azmonite.






Players face the challenge of choosing, managing, and strategically repositioning their squad through the precise timing, targeting, and selection of card plays. This gameplay element adds an extra layer of challenge beyond traditional turn-based deckbuilding.

The game adopts a roguelike format and incorporates an Ascension System inspired by Slay the Spire. This transparent system ensures exceptional replayability by incrementally unlocking content while increasing the difficulty level as you succeed. It is a compelling experience for players of all skill levels.

Arkinid formations are selected randomly based on the planet and biome. Their strength is influenced by darkness, the number of characters in the player's squad, and the number of deployed turrets at the time of spawn.

Central to survival is managing shields, which serve the dual purpose of protecting your assets from damage and powering some card-based abilities.

Drawing inspiration from renowned sci-fi franchises like Starcraft, the extensive and growing stable of Arkinids brings a fresh and engaging dynamic to the game.

The game leverages randomness across various elements, including node layouts, battlefields, enemy encounters, formations, and loot choices, ensuring that no two playthroughs are identical. This adds a layer of unpredictability and excitement to each session and makes learning the game mechanics more worthwhile.

Featuring high-quality VFX, dynamic combat soundtracks, voice acting, and a wide range of sound effects, the game aims to fully immerse players in its action-packed world.






Battle Over Azmonite introduces a card-forging system that enables players to combine three identical cards into a more potent version. Typically, these upgraded cards come at a higher energy cost, adding a layer of strategy to deck management.

Additionally, players can re-roll all their loot choices using their collected Azmonite reserves. This feature introduces critical and luck-based decision-making, allowing players to navigate their path flexibly and adaptably.
